mapper.select: select so.id, so.name, so.type, so.code, so.his_id, so.secret, so.his_worker, so.exchange_url, so.exchange_secret, so.config, so.logo from sys_org so
select sd.id, sd.name from sys_dept sd

select su.id, sw.id as worker_id, sd.org_id, sw.name, sw.pic from sys_user su inner join sys_worker sw on su.worker_id = sw.id inner join sys_dept_worker sdw on sdw.worker_id = sw.id and sdw.status = 'a' inner join sys_dept sd on sd.id = sdw.dept_id
select sw.id as worker_id, sd.org_id, sw.name, sw.pic from sys_worker sw inner join sys_dept_worker sdw on sdw.worker_id = sw.id and sdw.status = 'a' inner join sys_dept sd on sd.id = sdw.dept_id

select su.id, sw.id as worker_id, sd.org_id, sw.name, sw.pic from sys_user su inner join sys_worker sw on su.worker_id = sw.id inner join sys_dept_worker sdw on sdw.worker_id = sw.id and sdw.status = 'a' inner join sys_dept sd on sd.id = sdw.dept_id where su.id = #{userId}

select sw.id as worker_id, sd.org_id, sw.name, sw.pic from sys_worker sw inner join sys_dept_worker sdw on sdw.worker_id = sw.id and sdw.status = 'a' inner join sys_dept sd on sd.id = sdw.dept_id where sw.id = #{workerId}
